message: These two douchebags couldn't take down a Christmas tree.

A few important things to note: A) Milwaukee may not have been as cold. Considering Indianapolis was predicted to be colder than Chicago. B) it's not just about kids standing outside but the fact that buses don't or won't start. That's an issue C) you said global warming aside. What the hell does that mean? I'm assuming your comment was meant to refer to the fact that it is a myth because it's so very cold. If that's the case then that's sad. It's sad because if you knew anything about global warming you would know that it would mean hotter in summer, colder in winter. D) this guy is a lawyer so I'm assuming he'd be first in line with a lawsuit against the school because his little Timmy got too cold.

As an American hispanic, I'm tired of how all of these coward racist liberals that hate America like Obama, Clinton, and their supporters are trying to turn this great country into a 3rd world one. Unfortunately, one of the biggest problems we have right now is the media and entertainment that are always trying to tell us how to think. They have created enough imbeciles that would re-elect a failure like Obama. Even more, I'm supposed to bow down to anti-American Obama, love liberal policies no matter how destructive they are, love bigger enslaving government, and be in favor of illegal immigration because of the color of my skin... disgusting. That's why I and others created """"Chepo Team"""", the first true pro-America, comic strip. Please support our cause by liking our facebook page at: . Thank you
